version_description:
1.Added 'Talents'  feature to Heroes
Enabled at Level 52
Feature access: Capital→Hero→Talents
Gameplay Mechanics:
A. You can charge the 3 parts of a talent to get a certain Stats Boost
B. The materials consumed for the different parts are the same, and the Stats increase is also the same
C. Each time you charge, you can get 1 XP. When the XP reach the cap, you need to ascend before you can continue to charge
D. Ascending allows to increase the charge cap and unlock potential skills. When the 3 parts have the same potential, the potential will be activated
E. The charging materials 'Magic Cube' and [Fairy Heart] can be obtained via the Fairy gameplay

2. Added 'Fairy' development gameplay to Training
Enabled at Level 52
Feature access: Capital→Training→Fairy
Gameplay Mechanics:
A. The Fairy system can produce talents charging materials
B. The fairies will continuously produce Fairy Eggs when you’re AFK, and you can purchase Fairies using Fairy Eggs
C. Two identical fairies can merge into a more advanced fairy. The higher the level, the more materials will be produced
D. The Fairy Hearts can be collected at regular intervals, and the number of Fairy Eggs you can obtain is based on the number of fairies deployed
E. Every day at 5:00, you can obtain a certain number of Magic Cubes based on the number of fairies deployed
F. There are 3 blessing opportunities every day. Blessing friends can shorten their collection CD

3. Added the 'Hero Treasure' success feature in Glory of Heroes. You can now get rewards after obtaining the designated titles
4. Added multiple bonus events in weekly quests 
5. Added effects for weather changes in the Capital, they are divided into three scenes: morning, afternoon, and night
6. Optimized graphics performance of some features
7. Added a Daily Discount Store

3.A new hero Zhao Yun-Valiant General
skill description
